Category: COSMETIC AND MEDICAL EQUIPMENT AND IMPLEMENTS
Name: Cosmetic box
Description: This receptacle is a cosmetic box formed of 4 juxtaposed cylinders. The lid, fixed by a button of bone and held in place by a rod,  is decorated with a rodent figurine. The inside of the box is composed of five cylindrical cavities. The object served to preserve kohl which the Egyptians used for protecting the eyes from the effects of harmful rays of the sun.
